snippet: Kevin Love was suspended for two games after stomping the Rockets' Luis Scola. Mike Brown was suspended for one game and fined $25,000 for the way he protested a call against the Jazz.
abstract: Kevin Love was suspended for two games after stomping the Rockets' Luis Scola. Mike Brown was suspended for one game and fined $25,000 for the way he protested a call against the Jazz.
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. league office was busy Monday with disciplinary issues, handing out a fine and suspensions to the Timberwolves star Kevin Love and Lakers Coach Mike Brown.

headline.main: N.B.A. Suspends Timberwolves' Love and Lakers' Brown
